Your New Signature Wine

Ideal for every vibe, from chill hangouts to grand celebrations, Rouge is encased in eco-friendly carton packaging, crafted from 100% natural ingredients, ensuring a delightful and responsible choice for every occasion.

  • 100% Natural Ingredients: We’re all about authenticity and quality, ensuring every sip is free from artificial stuff.
  • Bold and Rich Flavours: Dive into a world of intricate flavours that dance on your palate and leave a memorable aftertaste.
  • Elegantly Packaged: Our bottles are a work of art, showcasing the exquisite wine within and making a statement on any shelf.
  • Vegan-Friendly: Crafted with compassion, our wine is ready to be enjoyed by all, embracing diverse lifestyle choices.
  • Perfect for Gifting: Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or just because, JuiceBox is the gift that keeps on giving.
